feature_name: User logs in using auth/login page (e.g. coming from an external site)

whens_list: I login with username: teacher password: password using auth/login page
I should not see "Invalid Login or password."
I login with username: student password: password  using auth/login page
I should not see "Invalid Login or password."
I login with username: teacher_WRONG password: password using auth/login page
I should see "Invalid Login or password."
I login with username: teacher password: password_WRONG using auth/login page
I should see "Invalid Login or password."
